thm sspval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 = { s0 ∈ NrmCVec |((+v ` s0)⊆ c2 ∧(.sOLD ` s0)⊆ c3 ∧(normCV ` s0)⊆ c4)})
  ⊣ c2 =(+v ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(.sOLD ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(normCV ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(SubSp ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl5eq(c1, { s0 ∈ NrmCVec |((+v ` s0)⊆ c2 ∧(.sOLD ` s0)⊆ c3 ∧(normCV ` s0)⊆ c4)}, (SubSp ` c0), c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cnv, css, { s0 ∈ NrmCVec |((+v ` s0)⊆ c2 ∧(.sOLD ` s0)⊆ c3 ∧(normCV ` s0)⊆ c4)}, { s0 ∈ NrmCVec |((+v ` s0)⊆(+v ` hs0)∧(.sOLD ` s0)⊆(.sOLD ` hs0)∧(normCV ` s0)⊆(normCV ` hs0))})
  rabbidv(s0, cnv, hs0 = c0, ((+v ` s0)⊆(+v ` hs0)∧(.sOLD ` s0)⊆(.sOLD ` hs0)∧(normCV ` s0)⊆(normCV ` hs0)), ((+v ` s0)⊆ c2 ∧(.sOLD ` s0)⊆ c3 ∧(normCV ` s0)⊆ c4))
  3anbi123d(hs0 = c0, (+v ` s0)⊆(+v ` hs0), (.sOLD ` s0)⊆(.sOLD ` hs0), (normCV ` s0)⊆(normCV ` hs0), (+v ` s0)⊆ c2, (.sOLD ` s0)⊆ c3, (normCV ` s0)⊆ c4)
  sseq2d((+v ` s0), (+v ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((+v ` hs0), c2, (+v ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cpv)
  sseq2d((.sOLD ` s0), (.sOLD ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((.sOLD ` hs0), c3, (.sOLD ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cns)
  sseq2d((normCV ` s0), (normCV ` hs0), c4, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((normCV ` hs0), c4, (normCV ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cnmcv)
  df-ssp(hs0, s0)
  ssexi({ s0 ∈ NrmCVec |((+v ` s0)⊆ c2 ∧(.sOLD ` s0)⊆ c3 ∧(normCV ` s0)⊆ c4)}, ((P(c2)× P(c3))× P(c4)))
  xpex((P(c2)× P(c3)), P(c4))
  xpex(P(c2), P(c3))
  pwex(c2)
  fvexi(c2, cpv, c0)
  pwex(c3)
  fvexi(c3, cns, c0)
  pwex(c4)
  fvexi(c4, cnmcv, c0)
  mprgbir(s0, cnv, { s0 ∈ NrmCVec |((+v ` s0)⊆ c2 ∧(.sOLD ` s0)⊆ c3 ∧(normCV ` s0)⊆ c4)} ⊆((P(c2)× P(c3))× P(c4)), (((+v ` s0)⊆ c2 ∧(.sOLD ` s0)⊆ c3 ∧(normCV ` s0)⊆ c4)→ s0 ∈((P(c2)× P(c3))× P(c4))))
  rabss(s0, cnv, ((P(c2)× P(c3))× P(c4)), ((+v ` s0)⊆ c2 ∧(.sOLD ` s0)⊆ c3 ∧(normCV ` s0)⊆ c4))
  syl5ibr(s0 ∈ NrmCVec, ((+v ` s0)⊆ c2 ∧(.sOLD ` s0)⊆ c3 ∧(normCV ` s0)⊆ c4), s0 ∈((P(c2)× P(c3))× P(c4)), < <(+v ` s0),(.sOLD ` s0)>,(normCV ` s0)> ∈((P(c2)× P(c3))× P(c4)))
  3impa((+v ` s0)⊆ c2, (.sOLD ` s0)⊆ c3, (normCV ` s0)⊆ c4, < <(+v ` s0),(.sOLD ` s0)>,(normCV ` s0)> ∈((P(c2)× P(c3))× P(c4)))
  syl2an(((+v ` s0)⊆ c2 ∧(.sOLD ` s0)⊆ c3), (normCV ` s0)⊆ c4, < <(+v ` s0),(.sOLD ` s0)>,(normCV ` s0)> ∈((P(c2)× P(c3))× P(c4)), <(+v ` s0),(.sOLD ` s0)> ∈(P(c2)× P(c3)), (normCV ` s0)∈ P(c4))
  syl2anbr((+v ` s0)⊆ c2, (.sOLD ` s0)⊆ c3, <(+v ` s0),(.sOLD ` s0)> ∈(P(c2)× P(c3)), (+v ` s0)∈ P(c2), (.sOLD ` s0)∈ P(c3))
  elpw((+v ` s0), c2)
  fvex(cpv, s0)
  elpw((.sOLD ` s0), c3)
  fvex(cns, s0)
  opelxpi((+v ` s0), P(c2), (.sOLD ` s0), P(c3))
  biimpri((normCV ` s0)⊆ c4, (normCV ` s0)∈ P(c4))
  elpw((normCV ` s0), c4)
  fvex(cnmcv, s0)
  opelxpi(<(+v ` s0),(.sOLD ` s0)>, (P(c2)× P(c3)), (normCV ` s0), P(c4))
  eleq1d(s0, ((P(c2)× P(c3))× P(c4)), < <(+v ` s0),(.sOLD ` s0)>,(normCV ` s0)>, s0 ∈ NrmCVec)
  nvop(s0, (+v ` s0), (.sOLD ` s0), (normCV ` s0))
  eqid((+v ` s0))
  eqid((.sOLD ` s0))
  eqid((normCV ` s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cnv)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈ NrmCVec |((+v ` s0)⊆ c2 ∧(.sOLD ` s0)⊆ c3 ∧(normCV ` s0)⊆ c4)})
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, (P(c2)× P(c3)), P(c4))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, P(c2), P(c3))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c2)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c3)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c4)
}

thm isssp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, cnv), w3a(wss(c3, c4), wss(c5, c6), wss(c7, c8)))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpv, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpv, c1))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cns, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cns, c1))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cnmcv, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cnmcv, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(css, c0))
} = {
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, cnv), w3a(wss(c3, c4), wss(c5, c6), wss(c7, c8))), wcel(c1, crab(hs0, cnv, w3a(wss(cfv(cpv, cv(hs0)), c4), wss(cfv(cns, cv(hs0)), c6), wss(cfv(cnmcv, cv(hs0)), c8)))))
  eleq2d(c1, c2, crab(hs0, cnv, w3a(wss(cfv(cpv, cv(hs0)), c4), wss(cfv(cns, cv(hs0)), c6), wss(cfv(cnmcv, cv(hs0)), c8))), wcel(c0, cnv))
  sspval(hs0, c0, c2, c4, c6, c8)
  elrab(hs0, c1, cnv, w3a(wss(cfv(cpv, cv(hs0)), c4), wss(cfv(cns, cv(hs0)), c6), wss(cfv(cnmcv, cv(hs0)), c8)), w3a(wss(c3, c4), wss(c5, c6), wss(c7, c8)))
  3anbi123d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cfv(cpv, cv(hs0)), c4), wss(cfv(cns, cv(hs0)), c6), wss(cfv(cnmcv, cv(hs0)), c8), wss(c3, c4), wss(c5, c6), wss(c7, c8))
  sseq1d(cfv(cpv, cv(hs0)), c4, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cpv, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cpv, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cpv)
  sseq1d(cfv(cns, cv(hs0)), c6, c5, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cns, cv(hs0)), c5, cfv(cns, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cns)
  sseq1d(cfv(cnmcv, cv(hs0)), c8, c7, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cnmcv, cv(hs0)), c7, cfv(cnmcv, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cnmcv)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c8)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cnv)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wss(c3, c4), wss(c5, c6), wss(c7, c8)))
}

thm isssp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec →(c1 ∈ c2 ↔(c1 ∈ NrmCVec ∧(c3 ⊆ c4 ∧ c5 ⊆ c6 ∧ c7 ⊆ c8))))
  ⊣ c4 =(+v ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(+v ` c1)
  ⊣ c6 =(.sOLD ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(.sOLD ` c1)
  ⊣ c8 =(normCV ` c0)
  ⊣ c7 =(normCV ` c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(SubSp ` c0)
} = {
  syl6bb(c0 ∈ NrmCVec, c1 ∈ c2, (c1 ∈ NrmCVec ∧(c3 ⊆ c4 ∧ c5 ⊆ c6 ∧ c7 ⊆ c8)), c1 ∈ { hs0 ∈ NrmCVec |((+v ` hs0)⊆ c4 ∧(.sOLD ` hs0)⊆ c6 ∧(normCV ` hs0)⊆ c8)})
  eleq2d(c1, c2, { hs0 ∈ NrmCVec |((+v ` hs0)⊆ c4 ∧(.sOLD ` hs0)⊆ c6 ∧(normCV ` hs0)⊆ c8)}, c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
  sspval(hs0, c0, c2, c4, c6, c8)
  elrab(hs0, c1, cnv, ((+v ` hs0)⊆ c4 ∧(.sOLD ` hs0)⊆ c6 ∧(normCV ` hs0)⊆ c8), (c3 ⊆ c4 ∧ c5 ⊆ c6 ∧ c7 ⊆ c8))
  3anbi123d(hs0 = c1, (+v ` hs0)⊆ c4, (.sOLD ` hs0)⊆ c6, (normCV ` hs0)⊆ c8, c3 ⊆ c4, c5 ⊆ c6, c7 ⊆ c8)
  sseq1d((+v ` hs0), c4, c3, hs0 = c1)
  syl6eqr((+v ` hs0), c3, (+v ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, cpv)
  sseq1d((.sOLD ` hs0), c6, c5, hs0 = c1)
  syl6eqr((.sOLD ` hs0), c5, (.sOLD ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, cns)
  sseq1d((normCV ` hs0), c8, c7, hs0 = c1)
  syl6eqr((normCV ` hs0), c7, (normCV ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, cnmcv)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(c8)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cnv)
  diff.hs0.w((c3 ⊆ c4 ∧ c5 ⊆ c6 ∧ c7 ⊆ c8))
}

blocks.name: sspid
blocks.content: A normed complex vector space is a subspace of itself. (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm sspid(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(css, c0))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cnv), w3a(wss(cfv(cpv, c0), cfv(cpv, c0)), wss(cfv(cns, c0), cfv(cns, c0)), wss(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(cnmcv, c0)))))
  jctr(wcel(c0, cnv), w3a(wss(cfv(cpv, c0), cfv(cpv, c0)), wss(cfv(cns, c0), cfv(cns, c0)), wss(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(cnmcv, c0))))
  3pm3.2i(wss(cfv(cpv, c0), cfv(cpv, c0)), wss(cfv(cns, c0), cfv(cns, c0)), wss(cfv(cnmcv, c0), cfv(cnmcv, c0)))
  ssid(cfv(cpv, c0))
  ssid(cfv(cns, c0))
  ssid(cfv(cnmcv, c0))
